Title: Trump orders reopening of notorious Alcatraz prison
Description: President Trump says the famous island prison off San Francisco is to be reopened to house "ruthless and violent" offenders.

Title: Popemobile to become health clinic for Gaza children
Description: One of the famous vehicles is being refitted as a frontline clinic on wheels, following a request by the late pontiff.

Title: Huawei Mate XT camera review: Putting all other foldables to shame
Description: Huawei's Mate XT deservedly gets a lot of praise for the unique tri-folding design, but its cameras are easily the best of any foldable I used.

Title: Why Israel plans to limit life-saving aid into Gaza. And, Diddy's trial begins today
Description:
Israel's cabinet approved a plan to limit the way life-saving aid is distributed in Gaza.
And, Diddy's trial begins today wth jury selection.

Title: Trump diminishing 'own scope of control' with Rubio in dual roles, says John Bolton
Description: Marco Rubio serving as both Secretary of State and national security adviser could be "ultimately disadvantageous" to President Trump, says former adviser John Bolton.

Title: With disability rights under attack, history offers hope and a possible playbook
Description: Harvard researcher Ari Ne'eman says the policy shifts underway under the Trump administration pose a unique threat to people with disabilities, but that they've fought for rights before and won.

Title: 'Star Wars Day' Celebrations Hit Fortnite, Disney+, X.com - and Retailers Everywhere
Description:
As May the 4th transforms into Star Wars Day, dozens of sites and games have found ways to celebrate.
The official Star Wars channel on YouTube released a celebratory video.
Disney+ released Tales of the Underworld , a six-part animated series about bounty hu…

Title: RIP Skype. Born: 2003. Died: today.
Description: Shut down by Microsoft, the beloved video chat app is leaving behind a very different world than the one it gave birth to.

Title: I'm 37 and have no kids. I wanted to wait until I had my first million before having babies.
Description:
Nur Anderson said he wanted to be financially stable before becoming a dad.
It's more about time and energy than the money aspect of it.

Title: Severe thunderstorms possible in South Florida, Palm Beach County on Monday
Description: South Florida east of Lake Okeechobee is under a marginal threat of severe weather.

Title: Paige Bueckers Takes It to the Next Level
Description:
Fresh off an NCAA championship with UConn, No.
1 draft pick Paige Bueckers adds to the WNBA’s momentum as she joins the Dallas Wings

Title: Pharma’s plastic prescription bottle problem gets a paper solution
Description: Kurt “CyberGuy" Knutsson discusses how a paper pill bottle could revolutionize pharmacy packaging and cut plastic waste drastically.

Title: Is This the End of the Separation of Church and State?
Description: Ruth Marcus reports on how the Supreme Court has eroded prohibitions on government sponsorship of religious schools, and now seem ready to end them entirely.

Title: The Promise of New York
Description:
Other cities have better infrastructure, fewer rats, cleaner streets, plentiful public toilets, more elbow room.
Yet people continue to flock here, Alexandra Schwartz writes.

Title: Why Can’t New York Have Nice Mayors?
Description: As the Trump Administration encroaches on the city, Andrew Cuomo and Eric Adams try to salvage their political careers.

Title: My New York City Tour of Tours
Description: Embedding with seven squads of New York tourists, Patricia Marx picks up some local lore (the Ramones loved Yoo-hoo; Peter Stuyvesant was uptight) and is made to do “a quick Donald Trump dance.”

Title: Lena Dunham on Why She Broke Up with New York
Description:
Most people accept the city’s chaos as a toll for an expansive life.
It took Lena Dunham several decades to realize that she could go her own way.

Title: No-Parking Zone: The Perils of Finding a Spot in N.Y.C.
Description: Why do New York drivers waste two hundred million hours a year circling the block? Zach Helfand reports from behind the wheel.

Title: Is This the Worst-Ever Era of American Pop Culture?
Description: Meet the critics who believe the arts are in terminal decline.

Title: How to Define Old Age
Description: Why would the World Health Organization want to call “old age” a disease?
